message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a fair deal, considering you'll only be getting 10% of the money in the next round anyway!
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Let's be reasonable, otherwise this will drag on and neither of us will benefit.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think 70/30 is a fairer split.  Let's not get greedy - if we keep rejecting each other, the value of the money will continue to decrease.  Think about it!

Alice, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle ground. This offer is a compromise, considering the time pressure and the decreasing value of the money. Let's settle this now and both walk away with something substantial.
